sentences.en: But Mr Stone is more interested in skewering rapacious financiers than rash homeowners.
sentences.cn: 但是斯通先生更感兴趣的是去讥讽贪婪的金融家,而不是冲动的物业购买者.

sentences.en: Hawks and other rapacious birds may be killed at any time.
sentences.cn: 隼和其他捕食动物的鸟随时可能被捕杀.

sentences.en: Hawks and other rapacious birds prey on variety of small animals.
sentences.cn: 老鹰和其他贪婪的鸟类捕食各种小动物.

sentences.en: He had a rapacious appetite for bird's nest soup.
No nation omits to record the actions of their ancestors, however bloody, savage and rapacious.
sentences.cn: 每个民族都不会消除他们祖先的历史记录,不论他们祖先的行为多么血腥, 野蛮和贪婪.

words.tran_cn: 强奸，掠夺；[园艺] 油菜；葡萄渣

trans.tran_cn: 贪婪的，（尤指）贪财的，抢劫的，掠夺的
trans.tran_en: always wanting more money, goods etc than you need or have a right to
